title: Follower of Rembrandt van Rijn
alt_titles: Follower of Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn
Follower of Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn
description: Rembrandt van Rijn’s singular approach to portraying the human experience garnered him countless followers, who may or may not have had direct contact with the artist when they produced their work.
